oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Walton B. Gossett ambrotype
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Walton B. Gossett (March 29, 1835-May 24, 1884), Co. B, 29th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, ambrotype. Gossett enlisted September 2, 1861. He was married to Mary Ann Ledford (November 19, 1835-May 27, 1875) and served with three of her brothers during the; war: Cpl. Hiram Asbery Ledford, Cpl. George Harrison Ledford, and Lt. James K. Ledford. Gossett also served with a neighbor, Sgt. Francis Marion Kendrick. An ambrotype of Kendrick, holding the same knife and in the same pose as Gossett, is known to exist.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gossett, Walton B.
